apps.Name: SoilCalc
apps.WorkDescription: Calculates the amount of soil required for soil coverage. Uses both Metric and Imperial measures.

apps.Name: BMICalc
apps.WorkDescription: A quick way to check your Body Mass index, using both Metric and Imperial measures

apps.Name: MechaTimer
apps.WorkDescription: Allows a countdown to be created with one hand, that silently vibrates when done
